text: Kanjani Eight (関ジャニ∞, kanjani eito, or Kanjani∞) is a Japanese boy band. The group is made of eight men. The group was made in 2002, and their first CD was released in 2004.They perform concert and release many CD now. == Members == This list contains the names and birth dates of group members * Yū Yokoyama (横山 裕) May 9, 1981 (Yū is his stage name, his real name is Kimitaka Yokoyama (横山 侯隆)) * Shingo Murakami (村上 信五) January 26, 1982 * Ryūhei Maruyama (丸山 隆平) November 26, 1983 * Shota Yasuda (安田 章大) September 11, 1984 * Tadayoshi Ōkura (大倉 忠義) May 16, 1985 == Ex-members == *Hiroki Uchi (内 博貴) September 10, 1986 *Subaru Shibutani (渋谷 すばる) September 22, 1981 * Ryō Nishikido (錦戸 亮) November 3, 1984 Category:Japanese rock bands Category:Pop music groups Category:Musical groups from Osaka Category:Musical groups established in 2002
title: Kanjani∞
